architectural_notes: Make focused changes only; ensure no other features or CRUD flows are impacted.

existing_features.title: Confine any code changes in this iteration to the login flow, pre-login experience, and trial gameplay access gating only; do not modify any other feature behavior or any existing CRUD logic/data flows outside authentication/trial gating.

projectName: Keep changes strictly scoped to login/trial gating without impacting existing CRUD/features
